PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-15712017-12-14,  ESDC,  ,  , 
ActCanada Mortgage and Housing Corporation Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Employment and Social Development of LINDA MORRIS of Surrey, British Columbia, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Canada Mortgage and Housing Corporation, to hold office during pleasure, on a part-time basis, for a term of four years.
AttachmentsAttachment
